name: Legend Of Zelda Fangame
description:
Welcome to my horrible fan game (trust me, it's bad).

Let us see what i did this time.

  1. Made in a collective 2.5 hours
  2. Made in MMF2 (kinda limited)
  3. It's in a top down perspective, which i'm not used to doing.
  4. Zelda.

Alright, This time you have to download it. Only .EXE, sorry mac users.

(unless you have one of those programs that let you open exe on mac then i guess your fine)

(might get updated i dont really care)

(oh yeah i just remembered, i remixed some of the original soundtracks from good ol midis)
